outputs.output_descr: The main activities will be to provide technical assistance to the Municipality of Strumica in coordination, preparation of needs assessment and implementation of early recovery activities for the recent wildfires. UNDP will support the coordination process led by the Municipality of Strumica and will ensure that the needs of the affected people and livelihoods are properly addressed. In addition, special attention will be given to the vulnerable groups mainly represented by the Roma community living in an informal housing settlement near to the affected forest.

project_descr: Emergency coordination support to Municipality of Strumica
